Uses of Package
com.wizturn.sdk.peripheral

  • Packages that use com.wizturn.sdk.peripheral 
    Package Description
    com.wizturn.sdk.central
    Provides classes, interfaces necessary for being central role
    com.wizturn.sdk.central.task
    Provides tasks for changing, connecting, disconnecting, authenticating peripheral(Beacon)
    com.wizturn.sdk.connection
    Provides connection related classes, interfaces.
    com.wizturn.sdk.peripheral
    Provides classes, interfaces necessary for being peripheral role
    com.wizturn.sdk.utils
    Provides useful helper classes being used in SDK.
  • Classes in com.wizturn.sdk.peripheral used by com.wizturn.sdk.central 
    Class and Description
    MultiplePropertyChangeBuilder
    This class provides a way of changing multiple properties(txPower, UUID, major id and so on) of a peripheral in a single method, MultiplePropertyChangeBuilder.commit(boolean).
    OnChangeMultiplePropertyListener
    Callback interface used to listen events which occur after multiple properties of peripheral has been changed.
    OnConnectListener
    Callback interface used to indicate state of the connection to the peripheral(e.g. beacon).
    Peripheral
    Defines a bluetooth device which acts as peripheral role(e.g. beacon).
    PeripheralAccessListener
    Callback interface used to listen events which occur after accessing peripherals.
    PeripheralScanListener
    Interface definition for callbacks to be invoked when peripheral is found.
  • Classes in com.wizturn.sdk.peripheral used by com.wizturn.sdk.central.task 
    Class and Description
    OnConnectListener
    Callback interface used to indicate state of the connection to the peripheral(e.g. beacon).
    Peripheral
    Defines a bluetooth device which acts as peripheral role(e.g. beacon).
    PeripheralChangeEvent
    Defines characteristic change events of Peripheral.
  • Classes in com.wizturn.sdk.peripheral used by com.wizturn.sdk.connection 
    Class and Description
    MultipleChangeBinarySemaphore 
    OnConnectListener
    Callback interface used to indicate state of the connection to the peripheral(e.g. beacon).
    Peripheral
    Defines a bluetooth device which acts as peripheral role(e.g. beacon).
    PeripheralAccessListener
    Callback interface used to listen events which occur after accessing peripherals.
    PeripheralProvider 
  • Classes in com.wizturn.sdk.peripheral used by com.wizturn.sdk.peripheral 
    Class and Description
    MultipleChangeBinarySemaphore 
    MultiplePropertyChangeBuilder
    This class provides a way of changing multiple properties(txPower, UUID, major id and so on) of a peripheral in a single method, MultiplePropertyChangeBuilder.commit(boolean).
    OnChangeMultiplePropertyListener
    Callback interface used to listen events which occur after multiple properties of peripheral has been changed.
    Peripheral

    Peripheral.Characteristics
    Indicates characteristics of bluetooth devices.
    PeripheralChangeEvent
    Defines characteristic change events of Peripheral.
